patterns: Can you teach me how to poach an egg?

responses: To sauté vegetables, heat some oil in a pan and cook the vegetables over medium-high heat until tender.

For grilling chicken, marinate the chicken and cook it on a preheated grill until the internal temperature reaches 165°F.
To make a roux, melt butter in a pan, add flour, and cook, stirring constantly, until it reaches your desired color.
